word:
Chap. 208 - To Brn-Srs. of the Iowa Conference (cf. Lt 134, 1902)

-Nov. 6, 1901-5. 
                                               B-165-1901 


                   Des Moines, Iowa, 1901, 

Dear brethren and sisters of the Iowa Conference,-- 
     I wish to write a few lines to you. In Iowa there are many places to be worked. As a general rule, the laborers in the Iowa Conference should go out from the churches into new fields, using their God-given ability to a purpose in seeking and saving the lost.
